title: If the area of Reservations (excluding D
clause_text: If the area of Reservations (excluding D.P. Roads / Road Widening) is more than 51% of the area of the Master Plan Layout then such situation can be considered as hardship and a composite building may allowed by charging premium for Land component @ 20% of the average ASR rate of ITP. However if area of reservations (excluding D.P. Roads / Road Widening) is more than 70% of the area of the Master Plan Layout then such premium shall be @ 10% of the average ASR rate of ITP.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
